section.heading: Eligibility requirements.
section.text: An applicant for a license as an asbestos worker shall establish to the satisfaction of the Board of Industrial Trades that the applicant:

para.text: Has successfully completed a course of instruction on asbestos abatement that has been approved by the Board; or
Currently holds a valid license in asbestos abatement from the federal government; and
Has provided such additional evidence as the Board or the federal government has determined is necessary for the occupation of asbestos worker.
